movies.title: Los suicidas
movies.plot: Daniel is a young journalist investigating the context of the photograph of a presumed suicidal. When he starts falling in love with Marcela, the assigned photographer for the research, the case will start to drag them into darkness.
movies.simplePlot: Daniel is a young journalist investigating the context of the photograph of a presumed suicidal. When he starts falling in love with Marcela, the assigned photographer for the research, the case will start to drag them into darkness.

biography.bio: Laura Agorreca was born in 1981 in La Plata, Argentina. She is an actress, known for El premio (2011), Solo (2013) and Capital (Todo el mundo va a Buenos Aires) (2007).
biography.name: Laura Agorreca

biography.bio: Eugenia Alonso is known for her work on L'homme d'à côté (2009), Cañada Morrison (2014) and Le Pape François (2015).
biography.name: Eugenia Alonso

biography.placeOfBirth: Buenos Aires City, Distrito Federal, Argentina
biography.bio: Leonora Balcarce started her career very young at 18 years in the television series "Montaña Rusa otra vuelta" in 1996. From there he did theater, film and television. She learned theater for 7 years with the actor Julio Chavez. In 2000 starred in the series "Verano del 98" and this year on film in "La ciénaga" with Graciela Borges and Mercedes Moran.
biography.name: Leonora Balcarce

biography.bio: Daniel Hendler was born on January 3, 1976 in Montevideo, Uruguay. He is an actor and director, known for Graduates (2012), Lost Embrace (2004) and The Bottom of the Sea (2003). He has been married to Ana Katz since 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Daniel Hendler

biography.bio: Héctor Lo Ríggio is an actor, known for Los suicidas (2005).
biography.name: Héctor Lo Ríggio

biography.bio: Mario Mahler is an actor and casting director, known for The Cat Vanishes (2011), El Asesor (2015) and Bombón: El Perro (2004).
biography.name: Mario Mahler

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Carlos Martínez yet.
biography.name: Carlos Martínez

biography.bio: Mariel Laura Sánchez is an actress, known for Los suicidas (2005) and El fotógrafo (2005).
biography.name: Mariel Laura Sánchez

biography.bio: Camila Toker is an actress and director, known for Ana and the Others (2003), Upa! An Argentinian Movie (2007) and Saturday (2001).
biography.name: Camila Toker

biography.bio: Javier van de Couter was born in 1975 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He is a writer and actor, known for Family Affairs (2003), Mía (2011) and Aire libre (2014).
biography.name: Javier van de Couter

biography.bio: Elvira Villarino is an actress, known for Taxi, an Encouter (2001), Disparitions (2003) and A Fly in the Ashes (2009).
biography.name: Elvira Villarino

biography.bio: Liliana Weimer is an actress, known for Rosas para su enamorada (1980), Barracas al sur (1981) and Vivir un poco (1985).
biography.name: Liliana Weimer
